GSD.product_version: versions from v4.4 to before v4.9.337
GSD.description:
scsi: hpsa: Fix possible memory leak in hpsa_add_sas_device()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.337 by commit 07e97ce1a239595f8b0bb5cfd368f586de4a2a5a, it was introduced in version v4.4 by commit d04e62b9d63a7498735761dc40eaed88b7fd9d80. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: scsi: hpsa: Fix possible memory leak in hpsa_add_sas_device()
